code:
# @param {Integer[]} nums
# @param {Integer} limit
# @return {Integer[]}
def lexicographically_smallest_array(nums, limit)
  n = nums.length
  (0...n).each do |i|
    # Find the position to swap with
    pos_to_swap = i
    (i+1...n).each do |j|
      if nums[j] < nums[pos_to_swap] && (nums[j] - nums[i]).abs <= limit
        pos_to_swap = j
      end
    end
    # Swap if a better candidate is found
    if pos_to_swap != i
      nums[i], nums[pos_to_swap] = nums[pos_to_swap], nums[i]
      break # Only one swap needed to get the lexicographically smallest arrangement
    end
  end
  nums
end
